TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BaseDataBoundControlDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner
Public MustInherit Class BaseDataBoundControlDesigner Inherits ControlDesigner
public ref class BaseDataBoundControlDesigner abstract : System::Web::UI::Design::ControlDesigner

summary.span: 在視覺化設計工具中，為衍生自 類別的控制項提供設計階段支援。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for controls that are derived from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在視覺化設計工具中，當您從來源切換到設計檢視中，標記描述控制項衍生自類別會剖析，並在設計介面上建立控制項的設計階段版本。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup that describes a control that is derived from the class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 當您切換回原始碼檢視中時，設計階段控制項程式碼會保存到標記來源，並編輯成 Web 網頁的標記。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control code is persisted to the markup source and edited into the markup for the Web page. 衍生自的設計工具抽象基底類別衍生自控制項提供設計階段支援類別。Designers that are derived from the abstract base class provide design-time support for controls that are derived from the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在內部建立衍生自的設計工具的新執行個體類別建立關聯的控制項的設計介面上時。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of a designer that is derived from the class when it creates the associated control on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool ConnectToDataSource() cil managed
Protected MustOverride Function ConnectToDataSource () As Boolean

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，一般是從先前的資料來源取消攔截事件，然後附加新事件至新的資料來源。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, typically unhooks events from the previous data source, and then attaches new events to the new data source.

returns.span: 一般來說，如果執行連接至新的資料來源，則為 ；如果新舊資料來源都相同，則為 。

span.span: if a connection to a new data source was performed, typically; if the old and new data sources are the same.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作方法通常牽涉到 hook 事件從先前的資料來源，並再將新的事件附加至新的資料來源。The implementation of the method typically involves unhooking events from the previous data source, and then attaching new events to the new data source.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void CreateDataSource() cil managed

summary.span: 在衍生的類別中覆寫時，會為關聯的 物件建立新的資料來源。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, creates a new data source for the associated object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 如需的覆寫，會顯示一個對話方塊，可用來建立資料來源相關聯的控制項，請參閱。For an example of a override that displays a dialog that can be used to create a data source for the associated control, see .

para.span: 覆寫方法以提供一種建立控制項相關聯之在設計階段物件。

span.span: Override the method to provide a means of creating a control for the associated object at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void DataBind(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl dataBoundControl) cil managed
Protected MustOverride Sub DataBind (dataBoundControl As BaseDataBoundControl)

param.name: dataBoundControl
param.span: 與這個設計工具關聯的 。

span.span: The with which this designer is associated.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，請執行必要的動作，以設定衍生自 類別的關聯控制項。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, performs the necessary actions to set up the associated control that is derived from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您覆寫方法，在設計工具中，衍生自類別中，執行必要的動作，以設定資料繫結控制項，以便擷取設計階段標記時，控制項正確轉譯。When you override the method in a designer that is derived from the class, perform the necessary actions to set up the data-bound control so that when the design-time markup is retrieved, the control renders properly. 一般而言，您會將關聯的設計階段資料來源，而不是即時的資料來源，基於效能的考量。Typically, you will associate a design-time data source rather than the live data source, for performance reasons.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DataSource { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定關聯控制項的 屬性值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the property for the associated control.

value.span: 資料繫結運算式，由衍生自 的關聯控制項使用。

span.span: The data-binding expression used by the associated control derived from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是用來陰影屬性與這個設計工具相關聯的類別。The property is used to shadow the property of the class that is associated with this designer. 值屬性保存在設計工具所產生基礎的標記上的資料繫結運算式為物件。The value of the property is persisted by the designer as a data-binding expression on the tag that is generated for the underlying object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DataSourceID { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定基礎 物件的 屬性值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the property of the underlying object.

value.span: 與基礎 關聯的 ID。

span.span: The ID of the associated with the underlying .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是用來陰影基礎屬性物件。The property is used to shadow the property of the underlying object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void DisconnectFromDataSource() cil managed

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，會從目前的資料來源取消攔截事件。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, unhooks events from the current data source.

para.span: 一般而言，當您覆寫方法，您將會中斷和事件。

span.span: Typically, when you override the method, you will disconnect the and events.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 物件所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the object, and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法取消的事件處理常式攔截所有的資料來源事件從設計工具。The method unhooks the event handlers for the designer from all data source events.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 產生在設計階段用來呈現控制項的標記。

span.span: Generates the markup that is used to render the control at design time.

returns.span: 在設計階段用來呈現控制項的標記。

span.span: The markup used to render the control at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別擷取用於在之前呈現控制項的設計階段繫結用途的範例資料。The class retrieves sample data that is used for binding purposes at design time before rendering the control. 如果控制項不是資料繫結，則會呼叫方法。If the control is not data bound, it calls the method. 如果沒有錯誤呈現控制項，它會呼叫方法。If there is an error rendering the control, it calls the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 如果控制項是空白，或者無法擷取資料來源，則提供在設計階段用來呈現控制項的標記。

span.span: Provides the markup that is used to render the control at design time if the control is empty or if the data source cannot be retrieved.

returns.span: 在設計階段用來利用空資料來源以呈現控制項的標記。

span.span: The markup used to render the control at design time with an empty data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別擷取用於在之前呈現控制項的設計階段繫結用途的範例資料。The class retrieves sample data that is used for binding purposes at design time before rendering the control. 空的設計階段控制項轉譯為包含的型別名稱和控制項名稱的預留位置。The empty design-time control renders as a placeholder that contains the type name and control name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetErrorDesignTimeHtml(class System.Exception e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetErrorDesignTimeHtml (e As Exception) As String

span.span: The that was thrown.

summary.span: 當錯誤發生時，提供在設計階段用來呈現控制項的標記。

span.span: Provides the markup that is used to render the control at design time when an error has occurred.

returns.span: 當錯誤發生時，在設計階段用來呈現控制項的標記。

span.span: The markup used to render the control at design time when an error has occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 錯誤設計階段控制項轉譯為一個預留位置，包含型別名稱、 控制項名稱，以及描述該錯誤的訊息。The error design-time control renders as a placeholder that contains the type name, the control name, and a message describing the error.

Public Overrides Sub Initialize (component As IComponent)

param.name: component
param.span: 衍生自 的控制項，會實作 。

span.span: A control derived from , which implements .

summary.span: 準備設計工具，以檢視、編輯和設計關聯控制項。

span.span: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計工具主應用程式呼叫方法準備好要用來呈現衍生自控制項的設計工具時類別。The designer host calls the method when it is ready to use the designer to render a control that is derived from the class. 以及其基底方法設定屬性，並連接事件所需的設計工具的作業。The method and its base methods configure properties and connect events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnDataSourceChanged(bool forceUpdateView) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnDataSourceChanged (forceUpdateView As Boolean)

param.name: forceUpdateView
param.span: 表示強制更新設計階段標記，否則為 。

span.span: to force the update of design-time markup; otherwise, .

summary.span: 在關聯 物件的資料來源變更時呼叫。

span.span: Called when the data source of the associated object changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法連線到目前的資料來源。The method connects to the current data source. 如果目前的資料來源是不同於資料來源的先前曾連線控制項，或`forceUpdateView`是`true`，相關聯的控制項重繪設計介面上時。If the current data source is different from the data source to which the control was previously connected, or `forceUpdateView` is `true`, the associated control is redrawn on the design surface.

para.span: 覆寫方法來執行關聯控制項的資料來源變更時所需的其他動作。

span.span: Override the method to perform additional actions that are required when the data source of the associated control changes.

para.span: 如果您覆寫方法，呼叫基底實作，然後再執行其他處理。

span.span: If you override the method, call the base implementation before performing other processing.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnSchemaRefreshed() cil managed

summary.span: 在關聯 物件的資料來源載入新的結構描述時呼叫。

span.span: Called when the data source of the associated object loads a new schema.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會處理事件，就會引發此事件相關聯的控制項為繫結至來源資料的結構描述時變更。The method handles the event, which is raised when the schema of the data source to which the associated control is bound changes. 覆寫方法，以便使用新的結構描述時所需的其他動作。Override the method to perform additional actions that are required when new schema is available.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

span.span: The containing the properties to filter.

summary.span: 供設計工具使用，以便在 [屬性] 方格的顯示中移除或加入其他屬性，或是遮蔽關聯控制項的屬性。

span.span: Used by the designer to remove or add additional properties for display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項設計工具使用的方法，以衍生自陰影各種控制項屬性與對應的設計階段屬性在設計工具實作，並且將加入或移除屬性的方法**屬性**方格。Control designers use methods that are derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add or remove properties from the **Properties** grid. 如類別陰影控制項的屬性。For the class, the shadows the property of the control. 它會建立一份屬性陣列，然後將這些屬性加入至陰影的屬性。It makes a copy of the attribute array of the , and then adds these attributes to the shadowed property. 它會設定屬性加上陰影屬性`false`除非屬性控制項的屬性已設定為`true`。It sets the attribute of the shadowed property to `false` unless the attribute of the property of the control is already set to `true`.

para.span: 覆寫方法，以將屬性加入到或變更設計階段屬性集合中屬性的屬性。

span.span: Override the method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.

para.span: 請務必呼叫基底方法，然後再執行其他處理。

span.span: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult ShowCreateDataSourceDialog (System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner controlDesigner, Type dataSourceType, bool configure, out string dataSourceID);

.method public static hidebysig valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult ShowCreateDataSourceDialog(class System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner controlDesigner, class System.Type dataSourceType, bool configure, [out] string& dataSourceID) cil managed

public: static System::Windows::Forms::DialogResult ShowCreateDataSourceDialog(System::Web::UI::Design::ControlDesigner ^ controlDesigner, Type ^ dataSourceType, bool configure, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % dataSourceID);

span.span: A reference to this designer.
The type of data source.

param.name: configure
param.span: 表示啟用組態編輯， 則表示停用組態編輯。

span.span: to enable editing of the configuration, or to disable configuration editing.

param.name: dataSourceID
param.span: 頁面上 控制項的 ID。

span.span: The ID of a control on the page.

summary.span: 在設計主應用程式 (例如 [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]) 中，顯示對話方塊以協助使用者建立資料來源。

span.span: In a design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], displays a dialog box to assist the user in creating a data source.
A object.
